title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other LLMs locally with one command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—install via npm: npm i ollama.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama—pip install ollama; supports sync/async, streaming, and embeddings.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models in chains and agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Maven Central artifact lets JVM apps chat with local LLMs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama—gem install ollama; supports generate, chat, embeddings.

title: ollama-cli (rust)
summary: Rust crate offering typed async/sync bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-like inline suggestions.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker image and compose stacks (CPU/GPU) for running Ollama server containerized.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chatbot template that connects to local Ollama; dark mode, markdown, streaming.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration letting pipelines use Ollama generators or chatters.

title: ollama-curl
summary: Minimal curl examples showing how to call Ollama’s REST endpoints directly.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes, brainstorm, or Q&A using an Ollama backend.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Turn any folder of documents into a local RAG chatbot backed by Ollama embeddings & LLM.

title: ollama-node
summary: npm package providing a TypeScript-first client for Ollama (same repo as ollama-js).

title: ollama-pypi
summary: PyPI page for the official ollama Python package (mirror of ollama-python repo).

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for announcements, troubleshooting, and showcase projects around Ollama.
